Articles.Content:
I was surprised at how awesome this plane is. Give a watch. Exciting part starts at a minute thirty.....

http://youtu.be/C58TbeNheB0

Edited September 13, 2013 by polimerjones

Shortly after the maiden flight:

Press interviewing Jebediah Kerman "This aircraft is perfect for air launching test vehicles and spacecraft alike (in his mind he already sees himself dropping an SRB with seat and wings from this plane )"

No but seriously this is epic. I absolutely love the design... Did you use infernal robotics for lowering the cargo bay?
This is a pretty cool plane. Overly complicated. I like overly complicated!
Very nice plane, much better than any of my creations.
I love overly complicated too. I did you robotics to rotate and lower the center section. Its really fun! I'm trying to think of another really complicated ship to make.
